tool_description: The API fetches basic information of a LeetCode profile based on the provided username.
name: LeetcodeApi
title: LeetcodeApi

api_list.name: getMediumQuestion
api_list.description: Get the number of medium level questing solved by the user.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://leetcodeapi.p.rapidapi.com/mujtabah258/mediumQuestion"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leetcodeapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://leetcodeapi.p.rapidapi.com/{username}/mediumQuestion"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leetcodeapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
